resources.string: This app has been developed by Marie Bouin, IT Student at the Univerity Institute of Technology of Laval, France, for an Android school project.\n

Swipe to move all tiles !
 When two tiles with the same value touch, they merge into one !
 It's over when the grid fills up.
 Try to discover alls elements !
Click on an element to learn more about it.
Hydrogen belongs to the nonmetal\'s family. It is the most abundant chemical substance in the Universe. It is the lightest of all elements and the smallest and simplest of all atoms.
Helium belongs to the noble gases\' family. It is a colorless, odorless, tasteless and non-toxic gas. Helium is the second-most abundant element in the Universe (after hydrogen).
